name: Electronic Debt Markets Association - Europe
goal: To add to the financial stability and soundness of financial markets by organising and representing the community of electronic multilateral fixed income trading venues regulated in Europe, in order to express and have their view and inputs recognised by relevant authorities and other market participants
euInitiatives: MiFIR, MiFID II, Art. 26(5), RTS 22, RTS 24, Derivative Trading Obligations, Equivalence, TOTV, LEI issuer requirements, SFTR, GDPR
